data.name: RTK13 - Best scenario for "RTK" (Japan): "The Tyrant Returns" 『三國志』シナリオ案最優秀作品（日本）　「魔王帰還」
data.detailed_description:
"The Tyrant Returns," an outstanding scenario that was chosen as the best scenario created within Japan, will be added to the game.

- The Tyrant Returns
During the battle for control between Cao Cao and Yuan Shao, Dong Zhuo, who had been reported dead, was actually alive. Cao Cao called a truce with Yuan Shao, Liu Biao, Sun Ce and the others and once more sent a proclamation throughout the land. "The Tyrant must die!" The battle of the New Anti-Dong Zhuo Coalition was about to begin!

※ To play this DLC you need to have the latest patch installed.
data.about_the_game:
"The Tyrant Returns," an outstanding scenario that was chosen as the best scenario created within Japan, will be added to the game.

data.short_description: "The Tyrant Returns," the winner of the Original Scenario Contest held within Japan during October of 2016, will be added to the game.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
